com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord

Class InputManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord.InputManager

  • public class InputManager
extends Object
    Poll devices and store events we care about in keystate. Eventually keystate should be expanded to hold all input events.
    Author:
    dan royer
